item.title: Hillbillies
item.description:
Hillbillies are so called because their Ulster-Scots Ancestors supported King William III during the Williamite War.

Ulster

You may be familiar with current events in Northern Ireland. This history goes back to a time when Scots from Southern Scotland and Northern England colonized Ulster which is Northern Ireland.

Scottish Marches …

item.title: Veneti
item.description:
Who were the Veneti? This is not an easy question to answer.

Baltic Veneti

The Vistula Veneti were called Wends, by German-speaking people. But another theory is that Veneti is a diminutization of venus, as per Latin origins. And for further confusion, Slavs living near Germanic settlements were also called …
item.dc:creator: Trent Palmer

item.title: Guideschi You Guys
item.description:
"You Guys!" was an insult. But this expression was transformed into a term of endearment, in America, by the working class. Because that is what the working class do.

Gunpowder Plot

You are probably familiar with the Gunpowder Plot, in which Guy Fawkes, attempted to blow up Parliament on 5 …

item.title: Lohengrin
item.description:
Have you heard of Lohengrin? It is a German Opera written and composed by Richard Wagner in 1850. I happen to think that German Opera is more entertaining than Italian Opera, but enough about me.

King Ludwig II

item.dc:creator: Trent Palmer

item.title: Battle In The Middle Ages
item.description:
There were three type of battles in Europe in the Middle Ages:

  1. Raids
  2. Sieges
  3. Field-Battles

There were two types of soldiers in Europe in the Middle Ages:

  1. cavalry
  2. and infantry.

Raids

Infantry tended to not be used in raids, because horses had the advantage in speed and mobility.

Sieges

Cavalry …
